sentences.sContent: In case of bill purchase / discount , exposure per drawee generally should not exceed 35 % of the sanctioned fbp limit.
sentences.sContent_eng: In case of bill purchase / discount , exposure per drawee generally should not exceed 35 % of the sanctioned fbp limit.
sentences.sCn: 如果是押汇贴现票据，每个受票人的敞口通常不应超过批准的出口押汇限额的35 % 。

synos.tran: （支票、汇票等的）[金融]付款人，[贸易]受票人

trans.tranOther: the person or organization on which a cheque or other order for payment is drawn
